bug.description:
Describe the bug The torch version described in requeirements.txt is 1.1.0, but I am facing the following error with torch version 1.3.0 while importing the en-sentiment model. UnpicklingError: A load persistent id instruction was encountered, but no persistent_load function was specified. To Reproduce
Force install torch==1.3.0 Run flair.models.TextClassifier.load("en-sentiment")
Expected behavior The model should be loaded.
Please have a look at the following google colab notebook, which contains the traceback and also the fix for this issue. <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1LIxvkBnYAwP62f6kiNyErBTXJCm7PHEn?usp=sharing>Link</denchmark-link>
Environment (please complete the following information):
OS [e.g. iOS, Linux]: Debian 9 Version [e.g. flair-0.3.2]: 0.7
Additional context This issue can be fixed using torch version 1.5.0 or above, Should I submit a PR for it?

comments.comment: Interesting, thanks for spotting this and providing the notebook! Yes, we'd appreciate a PR!
